method.name: GET
method.doc: Search for events based on the type indicated in the "what" parameter. API documentation : http://corporate.zvents.com/developers/documentation/search.html

param.name: what
param.doc: A string indicating the type of event, such as "parade" or "dancing".

param.name: where
param.doc: A string describing a location around which the search results will be restricted. (e.g., san francisco, ca or 94131). You can also specify a location using a longitude/latitude coordinate pair using the notation -74.0:BY:40.9

param.name: when
param.doc: A string specifying a date range for the search (e.g., today, this week, next week, friday, etc.). Explicit date ranges can be specified by separating two dates with the word "to" (e.g., monday to thursday, 10/30/2007 to 11/4/2007). Leave this string blank to search all future events.

param.name: radius
param.doc: The number of miles around the location (specified in the where field) to search. If this field is left blank, a default radius is supplied. The default raidus varies according to the location specified in the where field.

param.name: limit
param.doc: The maximum number of matching events to return. The default is 10 and maximum is 25.

param.name: offset
param.doc: The number of events to skip from the beginning of the search results. If a search matches 1000 events, returning 25 events starting at offset 100 will return event numbers 100-125 that match the search..

param.name: trim
param.doc: Set to 1 if repeating events should be trimmed from the search results. Set to 0 to return repeating events. If the trim option is enabled, only 1 event will be returned from each repeating series that matches the search. The number of events within the series that match the search is returned in the series_count response parameter. Defaults to 1.

param.name: sort
param.doc: Set to 1 to sort search results by time. Set to 0 to sort search results by relevance. Defaults to 0.

param.name: cat
param.doc: Restrict your search to items that belong to a specific category. You must provide a category identifier which can be determined using the categories API call.

param.name: catex
param.doc: Exclude items from a specific category from the search. You must provide a category identifier which can be determined using the categories API call.

param.name: cc
param.doc: Set to 1 to include category information in the search results. This will give you the list of categories within the search result set. You can search within a specific category using the cat option. Defaults to 0.

param.name: rec
param.doc: Set to 1 to include a list of events within the same repeat series that occur within the time range of the search. Defaults to 0.
